name: A Grand Army Of The Republic
Text: 'Deploy on table. Once per turn, if you just deployed a combat vehicle, may draw top card of Reserve Deck. During your deploy phase, may use 1 Force and reveal one [Clone Army] vehicle from hand to take into hand a clone pilot of ability < 3 (or vice versa) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle and deploy both simultaneously. (Immune to Alter).',
